chapter.title: Certificate Store
chapter.para: The certificate store is a common database for Firefox, Evolution, and NetworkManager at the moment. Other applications that use certificates are not covered but may be in the future. If you have such an application, you can continue to use its private, separate configuration.

sect1.para: All the certificates are stored under $HOME/.local/var/pki/nssdb/.

sect1.title: Importing Certificates
sect1.para: To import a certificate into the certificate store, do the following:

step.para: Open the dialog from EditPreferences. Change to AdvancedEncryption and click View Certificates.
Import your certificate depending on your type: use Servers to import server certificate, People to identify other, and Your Certificates to identify yourself.
